review: Daughter purchased a Fire Stick several months ago and really loved it.  We are Amazon Prime Members.  So we purchased one for ourselves.  We use it quite often.
author: JeffreyH

review: We have used this for a couple days now and really enjoy it.  It is very similar to an Apple tv but it is driven primarily around the Amazon prime system.  There are apps and games to play.  The apps download fast and they include hulu and Netflix to name a few.  I like the parental settings that force a pin #to be typed in when purchasing movies.  I also think the remote is easy to use.  I did notice that it seemed to get hung up when our internet slowed down and it persisted to show the spinning loading circle.  When our internet speed caught back up the Fire stick was still slow, so I ended up unplugging it and letting it reboot.  After that it worked fine and the picture quality is great.
